description: A gentle but a bit lonely fifth-grade student, he mourns the disappearance of his father, and has neglected school as a result. After being confronted by his classmates who pester him to return to school, he heads to an observing platform where he discovers the fugitive AM-ian Warrock by donning the Visualizer glasses left to him by his father, which allows him to view the EM Wave World. Warrock, having stolen the mysterious Andromeda Key from the FM King, claims to have knowledge of the boy`s missing parent. The two are able to merge together becoming Rockman. Subaru uses this new found power to protect his friends and others from the invading FM-ians.
name: Hoshikawa Subaru
